newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Fourteen killed as bus, truck collide in Brazil.
newsitem.headline: Fourteen killed as bus, truck collide in Brazil.

text.p: Fourteen people died and 39 were injured when a bus and a truck collided on a Brazilian highway, police said on Monday.
The accident occurred late on Sunday 15 miles (25 km) west of the city of Belo Horizonte, in Minas Gerais state, a local police spokesman said.
Thirteen of the dead were bus passengers while the driver of the truck was also killed when his vehicle burst into flames. Of the injured, six were in serious condition in a hospital.
